footer.description: New Aqua LLC introduces its Natural Spring Bottled Water – Borbor Aqua. Our range of products consists of 0.25L, 0.33L, 0.5L, 1L, 5L & 19L water bottles. Our Natural spring bottled water is non-carbonated. It is rich in natural minerals that provide valuable health benefits to everyone.
